mapper.select: SELECT vp.id, vp.work_cycle as workCycle, vp.video_id as videoId, v.name as videoName, vp.agency_id as agencyId, oa.name as agencyName, vp.play_address as playAddress, vp.play_start_time as playStartTime, vp.play_end_time as playEndTime, vp.play_duration as playDuration, vp.visitor_count as visitorCount, vp.principal, vp.remarks FROM video_play vp LEFT JOIN org_agency oa ON vp.agency_id = oa.id LEFT JOIN video v ON vp.video_id = v.id WHERE oa.is_delete = 0 AND vp.id = #{id}

SELECT vp.id,vp.work_cycle workCycle,SUM(vp.play_duration)duration,SUM(vp.visitor_count)visitorCount,org.name agencyName FROM video_play vp LEFT JOIN org_agency org ON vp.agency_id = org.id WHERE org.is_delete = 0
AND vp.work_cycle =#{workCycle}
AND org.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{agencyName},'%')
GROUP BY vp.agency_id

SELECT vp.id,vp.work_cycle workCycle,SUM(vp.play_duration)duration,SUM(vp.visitor_count)visitorCount,org.name agencyName FROM video_play vp LEFT JOIN org_agency org ON vp.agency_id = org.id WHERE org.is_delete = 0
AND org.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{agencyName},'%')
GROUP BY vp.work_cycle ORDER BY vp.work_cycle
